alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:53AM PST until January 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with blowing snow possible. The hazardous conditions likely will impact travel along I-84 and Highway 204.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
